column2:
"It's been a while since the two of us have been alone like this, huh?
...I'm kinda happy about it."
"A lot more people have been talking to me lately, and I've found myself working with them more and more. Not that that's a bad thing..."
"I just think it's important to get some time to myself. It gives me a chance to catch up with you, too, senpai."
"Ah... I-it's not that I particularly dislike everyone else, or anything."
"...I mean, sometimes the crazy orders we get can be a bit stressful, but I enjoy my work all the same."

"Why am I saying all that?
...Because you always look like you're worried about me."
"I'm fine, senpai. I might be awkward or slip up sometimes, but I'm doing just fine."
"So, rather than worrying about me, why don't you start relying on me more? I'm an ARKS too, you know."
"...No, that doesn't feel right. From your point of view, I guess I'll always be a rookie, won't I?"

"You don't have to take my help, but...
If you have any troubles, you can always tell me. I'm a good listener."
